page.title: 03TRANSPORT
page.content: In this area,transport is mainly by motor vehicles on the B724 and many smaller side roads.There is a regular bus service. There is a railway line through the Parish ,but the station in Cummertrees is closed. Passenger trains,and goods trains,trains with cars,and repair trains zoom past every day. There are 4 railway bridges. Every year old motor cars,vintage and veteran, pass through the village. We have no airports,but jets go over. We have no harbours,but boats can sail out of Powfoot.There is only 1 boat on shore there just now.
